metadata.name: ProjectReapers#1
metadata.description: Whoever said the Reaper was just a myth, lied. It has been confirmed in recent footage that the Reaper is more than just a myth. This ghastly figure is a real thing out there, and it looks as terrifying as ever.  These cool NFTs come with rare traits such as attack scythe, unstable eyes and Ethereum stones that will chill you to the bone. This Halloween, you can mint your very own Project Reapers NFT with the limited supply of 5000.  You'll love the ghostly details on the limited-edition animated NFT mint!  Here's your chance to get these rare collectibles!
